root.name: Tomb Raider: The Lost Artifact
root.description: OverviewPicking up after Tomb Raider III, The Lost Artifact finds Lara Croft on adventure searching for the Hand of Rathmore, taking her from the castle of the late Dr. Willard in the Scottish Highlands through the Channel Tunnel to Paris and to the Poissy Zoo.

similar_games.game: Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine
